About Kalulini Boy's High School

Founded in 1985, Kalulini Boy's High School has been a beacon of academic excellence and character development for nearly four decades. Our institution is dedicated to nurturing young men into responsible, educated, and ethical leaders.

Located in a serene environment conducive to learning, our school combines traditional values with modern educational approaches. We believe in holistic education that develops not just the mind, but also the body and spirit.

With a dedicated faculty, state-of-the-art facilities, and a proven track record of academic success, Kalulini Boy's High continues to be the school of choice for families seeking quality education for their sons.

Our Core Values

The principles that guide everything we do at Kalulini Boy's High School

Excellence

We strive for the highest standards in academics, sports, and character development.

Integrity

We cultivate honesty, responsibility, and ethical behavior in all our students.

Innovation

We embrace modern teaching methods and technology to enhance learning.

Leadership

We develop confident leaders who make positive contributions to society.

Academic Excellence

Our comprehensive curriculum is designed to challenge and inspire students, preparing them for success in higher education and beyond.

World-Class Facilities

Our state-of-the-art facilities provide students with the best environment for learning, growth, and development.

Modern Classrooms

Spacious, well-lit classrooms equipped with modern teaching aids and technology.

Science Laboratories

Fully equipped labs for Biology, Chemistry, and Physics practical sessions.

Library & Resource Center

Extensive collection of books, journals, and digital resources for research.

Sports Facilities

Football field, basketball court, volleyball court, and athletics track.

Computer Lab

Modern computer lab with high-speed internet for ICT education.

Dormitories

Comfortable boarding facilities with modern amenities and 24/7 security.

Admissions Process

Join the Kalulini Boy's High School family. Our admissions process is straightforward and transparent.

1

Submit Application

Complete and submit the online application form with required documents.

2

Entrance Exam

Attend the scheduled entrance examination at our campus.

3

Interview

Participate in a brief interview with our admissions team.

4

Admission Decision

Receive your admission decision within two weeks.

Required Documents

  • Completed application form
  • Birth certificate (original and copy)
  • KCPE certificate and results slip
  • Transfer certificate from previous school
  • Recent passport-size photographs (4 copies)
  • Medical examination report
  • Recommendation letter from primary school head teacher

Ready to Apply?

Applications for the 2025 academic year are now open. Don't miss this opportunity to join one of the leading boys' schools in the region.
